originalTitle: Nigeria police confirm mass church abductions after previous denial
title: Nigeria police confirm mass church abductions after previous denial
content: More than 160 people were reportedly taken from three churches in the northern Kaduna state.

originalTitle: Detained veteran Ugandan opposition figure critically ill in hospital, his party says
title: Detained veteran Ugandan opposition figure critically ill in hospital, his party says
content: Kizza Besigye’s party says his condition is critical, but authorities say he was taken to hospital for a routine check-up.

originalTitle: Ex-president accused of murder plot expelled from Togo to Burkina Faso
title: Ex-president accused of murder plot expelled from Togo to Burkina Faso
content: Paul-Henri Sandaogo Damiba has not commented on the accusations from Burkina Faso.

originalTitle: Trump says he wants ‘ownership’ of Greenland, but ‘won’t use force’
title: Trump says he wants ‘ownership’ of Greenland, but ‘won’t use force’
content: Donald Trump said the US needs “ownership” of Greenland, but he “won’t use force” to acquire the territory.

originalTitle: Fact-checking US President Trump’s speech marking one year in office
title: Fact-checking US President Trump’s speech marking one year in office
content: Trump marked his second term anniversary by showcasing achievements, immigration actions, and addressing foreign policy.

originalTitle: Three journalists among 11 Palestinians killed in Israel’s attacks on Gaza
title: Three journalists among 11 Palestinians killed in Israel’s attacks on Gaza
content: The three journalists worked for a committee supervising Egyptian aid in Gaza and were documenting a newly set-up camp.

originalTitle: Could US Congress stop Trump from taking over Greenland?
title: Could US Congress stop Trump from taking over Greenland?
content: Some of the president's fellow Republicans oppose him - but it's not clear if they would join Democrats to block a takeover of the island.

originalTitle: Israeli PM Netanyahu agrees to join Trump's Board of Peace
title: Israeli PM Netanyahu agrees to join Trump's Board of Peace
content: Israel is the latest country to publicly accept an invitation to Trump's new organisation, joining Albania, Bahran, Hungary, Morocco and the UAE.

originalTitle: Photos leaked to BBC show faces of hundreds killed in Iran's brutal protest crackdown
title: Photos leaked to BBC show faces of hundreds killed in Iran's brutal protest crackdown
content: The images from one mortuary in Tehran were shown to families who went to identify their loved ones.

originalTitle: Palace striker Mateta tells club he wants to leave
title: Palace striker Mateta tells club he wants to leave
content: France striker Jean-Philippe Mateta has 18 months remaining on his current deal at Selhurst Park and as things stand he will not be signing an extension.

originalTitle: Women's Club World Cup schedule could be 'catastrophic' for WSL
title: Women's Club World Cup schedule could be 'catastrophic' for WSL
content: English players and officials are shocked by the current scheduling for the inaugural Women's Club World Cup because of the impact it could have on the WSL.

originalTitle: Why do Chelsea want another centre-back?
title: Why do Chelsea want another centre-back?
content: The Blues already have eight central defenders on their books, so why are they still looking to bring another centre-back to the club?
